thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 11 of 218
thread.title: Mario Christen

author: Mario Christen
title: Mario Christen
text: I gave this company 4 stars only because I don't the like the size of the device, but as far as Customer Service & Dependability this product is GREAT and I would recommend it to a perspective customer. A manager from the company promptly got back to me and help me iron out my previous concerns and aside from the device being a bit big and bulky it works very well and is rather fast when trying to do samples and start the vehicle.
